1.0.name: wordpress/hello-kurt
1.0.description:
Just as Hello Dolly, this is not just a plugin, it symbolizes the angst and disconformity that eventually lead to the hope and enthusiasm of an entire generation wanting to make a change and mark a difference. When activated you will randomly see a lyric from Smells Like Teen Spirit in the upper right of your admin screen on every page.

This is a totally rip off from Matt Mullenweg's Hello Dolly plugin, so all credits should go to him.
